content:
Hi, we started investigating HAPI FHIR Plain Server. The cases that I've seen are running the server as a standalone component and inside the server providing own custom storage to access the resources.

Is there a way that HAPI FHIR Plain Server can be embedded in the existing app?
We have a spring framework 5 app, that is deployed to Apache Tomcat. We would rather include FHIR REST capabilities to it than integrate with 3rd party server.
the best place to ask is over on #hapi
